Physics of Life Group Away Day 2022

Physics of Life Group Away Day 2022

Posted on July 15, 2022

As every year, incredibly exciting to see so many success stories at the York Physics of Life group away day! Of particular note, a lot of notes about tech start ups and spin offs!
